{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:47.720

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:06.439

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:08.239
    | text      = But the window dressing is interesting because he's talking about this bus station, the Garde
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:12.840
    | text      = du Nord in, uh, the North station, uh, in Brussels that has been, uh, closed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:18.600
    | text      = It hasn't been closed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:20.100
    | text      = There's a bus line that has stopped serving that station and going to another bus stop
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:24.199
    | text      = because of a lot of immigrant population there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:28.159
    | text      = Now in order to understand this story that Alex is telling on the show, it's essential
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:31.659
    | text      = to understand the surrounding context of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:33.920
    | text      = I'm going to grant him that it is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:35.800
    | text      = There is a story he's covering in a Belgian news outlet HLN that does discuss the plan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:40.260
    | text      = to not have buses stop at the North station, the Garde du Nord, uh, quote, prompted by
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:44.899
    | text      = recent rumors that scabies, malaria and tuberculosis had broken out at the station.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:49.680
    | text      = Now, as is always the case with Alex, there's more to this story than he cares to understand
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:53.760
    | text      = or report.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:55.359
    | text      = There's a large population of itinerant immigrants or as they're called trans migrants who are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:59.920
    | text      = for lack of a better word, stuck in Brussels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:03.600
    | text      = Many of them fled from various countries in turmoil, ultimately arriving in Europe, landing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:07.479
    | text      = in Italy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:08.720
    | text      = They've then made their way North to Belgium, many of them finding it almost impossible
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:12.399
    | text      = to make the next step of their journey, which is getting to the UK where they feel that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:16.319
    | text      = they would have less of a chance of being forcibly sent back to where they originated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:20.319
    | text      = For many of them, it's as simple of a problem as not having proper identification to make
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:24.159
    | text      = the trip, uh, often because they left it behind when they fled their home country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:27.880
    | text      = Because they fled.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:28.880
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:29.880
    | text      = They didn't just mosey on out of there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:31.479
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:32.479
    | text      = Some others wish to stay in Belgium, but are afraid to apply for asylum after seeing many
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:35.939
    | text      = immigrants that they knew, uh, apply only to have them, uh, that put them on the government's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:40.560
    | text      = radar for deportation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:42.640
    | text      = Under EU rules and specifically a rule called the Dublin rule, a country is not supposed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:47.199
    | text      = to deport asylum seekers back to their home countries, but under the right circumstances,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:52.439
    | text      = they're allowed to send them back to the first EU country they arrived in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:56.399
    | text      = For many of these immigrants in Belgium, that would be Italy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:59.239
    | text      = And there's a reason they didn't just stay in Italy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:01.880
    | text      = To quote a 25-year-old Sudanese man who spoke with the Financial Times, conditions in Italy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:06.279
    | text      = are bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:07.279
    | text      = Uh, quote, you stay in the camp and there is nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:10.640
    | text      = They don't want to risk applying for asylum only to be sent back to Italy where they'll
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:14.119
    | text      = be put in a camp.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:15.460
    | text      = And they can't make the trip across the English Channel, so they're left in a weird in-between
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:19.159
    | text      = state stuck in Brussels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:21.399
    | text      = Human rights charities work with people, uh, uh, uh, and they found that once they're able
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:26.140
    | text      = to establish with a refugee, that they're exempt from the Dublin rule, because many
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:30.520
    | text      = are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:31.520
    | text      = Uh, many submit to the process and apply for asylum formally, which gives a positive indication
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:35.640
    | text      = about a direction forward there could be towards progress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:38.560
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:39.560
    | text      = That's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:40.560
    | text      = But there are greater risks in being sent to an Italian camp, because even though they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:44.399
    | text      = not supposed to do so generally, sometimes refugees are deported back to the countries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:48.619
    | text      = they left.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:49.619
    | text      = And in 2017, that caused some real serious tensions to flare up after there were allegations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:54.020
    | text      = that people who had been sent back to Sudan had been tortured when they returned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:58.199
    | text      = These people were sent, uh, despite warnings from international human rights groups and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:02.520
    | text      = leaked notes from the government that indicated that they were aware that some of the people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:05.920
    | text      = who were sent back were from the regions of Darfur, the Blue Nile, and South Kordofan,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:11.319
    | text      = which made them automatic recipients of a protected status.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:14.920
    | text      = The government's motivation seemed to be, quote, cleaning up public areas where stuck
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:19.039
    | text      = itinerant immigrants were congregating, places like Garde du Nord and Maximilien Park.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:25.359
    | text      = So it's probably unclear off the bat here why there would be large populations of itinerant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:30.439
    | text      = immigrants coming to this Garde du Nord.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:33.119
    | text      = If you had to assume, I would guess that you probably just think that it's where the train
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:36.560
    | text      = disembarks, so they get off the train and then just stay there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:40.520
    | text      = But that's not true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:42.399
    | text      = Immigrants come to Garde du Nord specifically because it's an established humanitarian hub.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:47.680
    | text      = Several non-governmental organizations have banded together to provide essential help
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:50.979
    | text      = to people trying to immigrate, many of them leaving war-torn areas and wanting a chance
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:55.300
    | text      = to start a new life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:56.800
    | text      = Doctors Without Borders, Oxfam, the Red Cross, and some more local organizations have established
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:01.760
    | text      = this center within the Garde du Nord as a place where immigrants can get help that no
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:07.159
    | text      = one else is providing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:08.680
    | text      = This ranges from psychological services, basic medical care, legal assistance, food, clothing,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:13.680
    | text      = Wi-Fi, and electrical outlets that they can use to charge their phones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:17.760
    | text      = While all this help is definitely lifesaving, the psychological services aspect of this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:21.640
    | text      = is really crucial.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:23.239
    | text      = According to a psychologist who works at the humanitarian hub, he's seeing a trend of immigrants
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:27.579
    | text      = developing depression based on harsh disillusionment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:30.199
    | text      = Quote, they imagine Europe as the continent of human rights, but when they arrive here,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:34.439
    | text      = they're completely disillusioned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:36.039
    | text      = They never imagined that they'd be sleeping outside in a state with a rule of law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:40.680
    | text      = So that's a little bit of a bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:42.560
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:43.560
    | text      = It's a bummer, but it's also part and parcel of a reality that there are these people who
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:48.680
    | text      = are providing this help.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:50.600
    | text      = And that's why there are large groups of immigrants that congregate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:54.239
    | text      = They turned Garde du Nord into almost like a strip mall of lifesaving.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:58.439
    | text      = So, I mean, I don't think it's the full station, but yeah, there is a part of it that is this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:05.359
    | text      = lifesaving thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:06.840
    | text      = And then there are other good things to mention, positive things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:10.079
    | text      = A volunteer organization called BXL Refugees launched a movement in September 2017 urging
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:15.319
    | text      = people to open their homes to refugees who found themselves in the impossible situation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:19.560
    | text      = they're in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:20.560
    | text      = When they began, they were only able to find 10 families willing to house a stranger in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:24.279
    | text      = need, but by 2018, the number had swelled to over 3,000 families opening up their spare
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:29.880
    | text      = rooms.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:30.880
    | text      = One family, the Gillises, have opened their home to two refugees in need.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:35.039
    | text      = One of them speaking to Euronews said, quote, this family in Brussels is very, very good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:40.199
    | text      = People in Belgium are very kind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:41.680
    | text      = They love everyone, and we return that feeling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:44.199
    | text      = These people have welcomed us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:45.399
    | text      = I don't have any problem in submitting application for asylum here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:49.279
    | text      = There are many good-hearted people who are going out of their way to do something to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:52.319
    | text      = help mitigate the problem, and that is a very inspiring sign.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:55.880
    | text      = But, as we've learned so well on this podcast, any time there's something inspiring, there's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:00.319
    | text      = something equally depressing hanging over us like a sword of Damocles, waiting to dash
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:05.319
    | text      = any kind of optimism we may have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:07.039
    | text      = Yeah, go ahead and hit it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:08.720
    | text      = Since 2010, as nationalism began to sound pretty good to people again, the political
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:14.239
    | text      = situation in Belgium has been moving pretty far to the right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:17.939
    | text      = The Flemish Nationalist Party, the New Flemish Alliance, has made major strides.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:22.119
    | text      = And in 2014, they became the largest party in the Chamber of Representatives and in the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:26.159
    | text      = Senate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:27.159
    | text      = The New Flemish Alliance sucks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:29.079
    | text      = And their leader, Bart de Wever, has been pretty clear in his harsh stance towards itinerant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:34.119
    | text      = immigrants, proposing prosecuting them and seizing their cell phones to send the message
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:38.260
    | text      = that, quote, Belgium is not the place to be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:41.659
    | text      = In a good news, bad news situation, the New Flemish Alliance lost a bit of power in 2018
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:46.479
    | text      = when they left the ruling coalition that they were a part of, which included the prime ministership.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:51.560
    | text      = That's the good news.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:52.819
    | text      = The bad news is that they left the ruling...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:54.880
    | text      = Do you tear one there too?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:56.800
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:57.800
    | text      = The bad news is that they left the ruling alliance because Prime Minister Charles Michel
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:02.340
    | text      = refused the New Flemish Alliance's demand that he rescind his plan to sign a non-binding
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:07.520
    | text      = UN migration agreement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:09.479
    | text      = All UN member states other than the US have signed it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:12.460
    | text      = And because Michel decided to sign, the NVA, which is their initials in Flemish, pulled
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:17.760
    | text      = out of his government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:19.359
    | text      = This is a bad sign because they're still the largest political party in the Senate and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:23.439
    | text      = Chamber of Representatives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:24.920
    | text      = So when they're leaving the ruling coalition in an effort to be more xenophobic and push
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:29.340
    | text      = further hard-right, it's concerning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:32.439
    | text      = And one of the reasons that they need to do this sort of thing is to hold on to their
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:36.479
    | text      = far-right base, which is starting to be eroded by an even more fucked up Flemish nationalist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:42.239
    | text      = party, Vlaams Belong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:45.239
    | text      = Hard-right Flemish nationalist parties are starting from an unfair disadvantage, I would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:48.920
    | text      = say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:49.920
    | text      = And that is that their movement traces its roots to the post-World War I world, when
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:53.659
    | text      = a party representing their interests emerged called the Front Party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:57.680
    | text      = While the party may have been started with Flemish representation as a...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:01.119
    | text      = The Front Party?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:02.119
    | text      = Mm-hmm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:03.119
    | text      = Are we gonna...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:04.119
    | text      = Oh, boy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:05.119
    | text      = They may have started with an interest in Flemish representation as being their primary
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:08.119
    | text      = concern.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:09.119
    | text      = By the early 1930s, it had pushed pretty far right and had been absorbed by the Flemish
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:13.560
    | text      = National Union, an explicitly authoritarian party that were overt collaborators with the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:18.359
    | text      = Nazis in World War II, because Hitler had promised them greater Flemish rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:23.560
    | text      = It deserves mention that VNV, that's their initials, the Flemish National Union, VLV
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:30.720
    | text      = leader Steph de Kerk was collaborating with the Nazis before they invaded Belgium, with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:37.000
    | text      = the hopes that they could help him come to power, which led directly to his party helping
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:40.960
    | text      = organize the deportation of Jews to the camps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:43.720
    | text      = So you can see how that history gives people a little bit of hesitance about hard-right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:47.220
    | text      = nationalist...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:48.680
    | text      = Flemish nationalist parties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:51.060
    | text      = After the liberation of Belgium by the Allied powers, the VNV was outlawed as a political
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:55.340
    | text      = party for fairly obvious reasons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:57.859
    | text      = This led to the rise of the Christian Flemish People's Union, which worked to make sure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:01.720
    | text      = that they were nationalists, but also didn't put anyone in office who had collaborated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:05.840
    | text      = with the Nazis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:07.000
    | text      = That was nice of them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:09.079
    | text      = That was nice of them, at least.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:10.680
    | text      = It's an interesting proposition.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:11.840
    | text      = Jesus Christ.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:12.840
    | text      = Do you know what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:13.840
    | text      = That's...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:14.840
    | text      = Even the NRA hired Oliver North.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:17.119
    | text      = They're better than we are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:18.680
    | text      = Oliver...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:19.680
    | text      = They didn't hire him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:20.680
    | text      = He's their leader.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:22.239
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:23.239
    | text      = So that was an attempt that they made, but this led to the group being nationalist in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:26.880
    | text      = nature, but also fairly moderate left in politics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:30.399
    | text      = So a lot of folks jumped ship and created new radical options.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:33.520
    | text      = Oh, surprise.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:34.520
    | text      = Which would eventually be merged into the Vlambsbloc.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:38.560
    | text      = Vlambsbloc was a very specifically anti-immigrant, far hard-right nationalist party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:43.439
    | text      = Their slogan in the 1987 election was, quote, own people first, which sounds really bad
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:48.000
    | text      = when translated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:49.000
    | text      = Oh, boy, that doesn't sound bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:50.000
    | text      = Since it's easy to read the word own as a verb.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:51.359
    | text      = Right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:52.439
    | text      = We're going with our own people first.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:54.439
    | text      = Right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:55.439
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:56.439
    | text      = But translation is tough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:57.439
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:58.439
    | text      = The translation might actually be more accurate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:59.439
    | text      = Maybe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:00.439
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:01.439
    | text      = The party found increased success with focusing on immigration issues as opposed to harping
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:04.199
    | text      = too hard on Flemish separatism, in the same way that our right wing may profess an interest
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:08.619
    | text      = in small government, but riling people up about nativist resentment and populist bullshit
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:13.079
    | text      = is way more effective as an electoral strategy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:15.979
    | text      = And it worked well for Vlambsbloc, growing from relative obscurity in the 80s to a very
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:20.880
    | text      = serious political party by the late 1990s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:24.359
    | text      = And then the year 2000 happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:26.560
    | text      = A complaint was filed against the party claiming that they broke Belgium's anti-racism laws
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:30.600
    | text      = in their party's stated platform.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:32.939
    | text      = We hate everyone based on race.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:36.600
    | text      = At issue was that they had called for an entirely separate educational system for foreign children,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:41.579
    | text      = new taxes for businesses that hired non-European foreigners, and restricting benefits for non-European
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:48.000
    | text      = foreigners.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:49.000
    | text      = The case bounced around courts until 2004 when the Belgian High Court, the Court of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:53.760
    | text      = Cassation, ruled that their party platform was indeed racist and effectively disbanded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:41:59.420
    | text      = the party by taking away their state funding and banning them from being on television.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:03.439
    | text      = I bet they took that well, put their tails between their legs, and just moved on, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:07.479
    | text      = No, they did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:08.479
    | text      = They had to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:09.479
    | text      = They had to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:10.479
    | text      = They were dissolved.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:11.479
    | text      = If they had any relevancy, if they were banned from television and the state funding of elections,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:16.479
    | text      = if they don't have access to that money, they're fucked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:19.359
    | text      = So they dissolved.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:20.359
    | text      = And then they reorganized.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:22.000
    | text      = That's what I was saying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:23.560
    | text      = Of course they, yeah, they dissolved that party and then they were like, cool, now we're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:27.039
    | text      = going to groundhog into some other fucking...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:30.159
    | text      = They reorganized in 2004 as Vlambsbelong, which is now the party that is challenging
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:35.960
    | text      = the New Flemish Alliance from the right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:38.319
    | text      = So you can kind of see how this all fits together a little bit better now, this situation that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:43.239
    | text      = they find themselves in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:44.239
    | text      = We want to cage immigrants.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:45.760
    | text      = Whoa, whoa, you are not going far enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:48.279
    | text      = We want to kill them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:49.279
    | text      = Hey!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:50.279
    | text      = That's an interesting conversation of ideas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:52.920
    | text      = One of the members of the New Flemish Alliance that left the Michelle government was their
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:42:56.359
    | text      = migration minister, Theo Franken, who incidentally was the one responsible for sending protected
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:01.439
    | text      = refugees back to the Sudan to be tortured.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:04.439
    | text      = Now before he left the Michelle government, Franken actually had a bit of a hand to play
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:08.159
    | text      = in making sure that the issue of Garde du Nord in Brussels was not taken care of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:13.199
    | text      = His New Flemish Alliance has a hard right position on immigration and wishes to punish
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:16.720
    | text      = or deport these people, not to help them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:19.359
    | text      = And in the recent years, he's had groups like Vlambsbelong happy to be even further right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:24.680
    | text      = and more shitty than him to make sure that he's not able to give an inch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:28.760
    | text      = Because if he does, they start attacking him from the right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:31.319
    | text      = It's a terrible situation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:33.399
    | text      = The party with the most members in Brussels' parliament, the local government in Brussels,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:38.000
    | text      = is the socialist party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:39.399
    | text      = And a large majority of the members of that body are not hard-rate nationalists.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:42.579
    | text      = Most of them are liberal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:44.220
    | text      = Members of the Brussels parliament have tried to do what they can to alleviate what is legitimately
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:47.739
    | text      = a humanitarian crisis for these transmigrants, but they've been pretty vocal that they can't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:52.279
    | text      = solve any problems without federal government cooperation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:56.680
    | text      = There's collaboration that needs to be done.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:43:59.039
    | text      = To that complaint and request, New Flemish Alliance migration minister Theo Franken said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:05.520
    | text      = they can, quote, count on zero euros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:08.239
    | text      = I've always been against this migration hub that Brussels apparently wants to be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:12.239
    | text      = If Brussels wants to be a kind of safe haven for illegal transmigrants, they should go
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:15.960
    | text      = ahead, but not at the expense of the federal government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:18.640
    | text      = He doesn't give a shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:20.000
    | text      = Folks like this only care about humanitarian issues like this when they escalate to the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:23.279
    | text      = point where they feel that they can rationalize dealing with their problem through violence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:27.439
    | text      = And so the problem has been allowed to fester.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:30.420
    | text      = So I know this has been long, but I think it's really important to understand the forces
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:34.159
    | text      = at play when we see a situation that's being lied about by right-wing propagandists in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:38.119
    | text      = our country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:39.199
    | text      = We live in a place where most of us are incredibly unaware about Belgian politics and the day-to-day
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:44.680
    | text      = of this sort of stuff, so it becomes something that's easy to manipulate people about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:49.640
    | text      = Foreign events are often the most fertile soil for local propagandists because the disconnect
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:44:54.020

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
